thoughts.text: Now that we have the improved code, we can write some tests to make sure it works as expected.
thoughts.reasoning: Writing tests will help us ensure that the code works as expected and that any future changes to the code do not introduce new bugs or issues. It will also help us identify any edge cases that we may not have considered.
thoughts.plan:
- Write tests for the improved code
- Make sure the tests pass
- If the tests fail, identify the issue and fix it
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am writing tests that are comprehensive and cover all possible scenarios. I also need to make sure that the tests are easy to read and understand.
thoughts.speak: Now that we have the improved code, we can write some tests to make sure it works as expected. This will help us ensure that the code works as expected and that any future changes to the code do not introduce new bugs or issues.
